# badgeTitlePositionAdjustment

**Instance Property**

The additional amount by which to offset the badge’s title horizontally and vertically.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var badgeTitlePositionAdjustment: UIOffset { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to specify the distance, in points, by which to offset the title. Positive values move the title down and to the right. Negative values move the title up and to the left.

## Configuring the badge appearance

- **badgeTextAttributes**: String attributes to apply to the text of the item’s badge.
- **badgeBackgroundColor**: The background color of the badge.
- **badgePositionAdjustment**: The additional amount by which to offset the badge horizontally and vertically.
